Personalized bracelets is simple in form but truly unique in its meaning - it's up to you! Choose names, places, initials, dates, words that keep you going - anything you want to make a truly special gift for her or for yourself.

Because Custom bracelets need to be made separately,So shipping time: 14-28 days is the default option, the actual transport time will be shorter, Usually 7-14 days can be sent to the hands of customers!
description: Our personalized bar bracelets are made with 100% stainless steel and will never tarnish.
Available in gold, silver, or rose gold plated finishes.
100% Permanent Laser Engraving that will never come off.
In addition to text, you can add various symbols:☺ ☹ ♡☪ ✉ ✈ ✪ ★✶✹ ✡ ☎ ➊ ➋ ➌ ➍ ➎ ➏ ➐ ➑ ➒ ➓,But Customize now does not support adding symbols, Please send email to us in the following format:
This personalized bracelet is simple, dainty and perfect Gift for your loved ones or yourself, like Birthday, Wedding, Anniversary and Christmas or everyday wear.
We use the highest quality Stainless steel  made materials that can be worn 24/7, in shower or in pool.
Easy to clean by washing it with water and soap.
We use expensive upgraded Rolo chain.
Quality thickness and have our signature hand polished finish
